name: wrap
description: Wrap native token (ETH) to WETH or unwrap WETH to native ETH. Executor-run on Ethereum, Base, and Arbitrum. Uses LI.FI DEX aggregation with direct WETH contract fallback (Uniswap-compatible).

action.description: wrap (native ETH -> WETH) or unwrap (WETH -> native ETH).

receiver.description: Receiver address for the wrapped/unwrapped tokens.

command.description: Alternative: natural-language command string. Example: 'wrap 5 ETH on base receiver 0x...'

dryRun.description: If true, returns quote without broadcasting.
